item.chl.copper_horn.great_sky_falling: It is only then that the grand sky comes to a fall
item.chl.copper_horn.old_hymn_resting: As we shall hum the resting hymns of long ago
item.chl.copper_horn.pure_water_desire: To our desires as of pure water
item.chl.copper_horn.mumble_fire_memory: As we humble away our memories o' incendiary
item.chl.copper_horn.dry_urge_anger: Our urgent anger is but of fluid
item.chl.copper_horn.clear_temper_journe: Clear our paths and temper for the journey ahead of us
item.chl.copper_horn.fresh_nest_thought: As he had a thought fresh from the nest
item.chl.copper_horn.secret_lake_tear: The lake hides a secret to tear
item.chl.copper_horn.fearless_river_gift: Do not be afraid. The river bestows a generous donation
item.chl.copper_horn.sweet_moon_love: Sweet love under the brightest moon
instrument.chl.fly_goat_horn: Take flight towards a clearer sky
instrument.chl.resist_goat_horn: One must resist the temptation, for it is unworthy
